Package cz.syntea.xdef.util

Tools for usage of X-definitions from command line.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DTDToXdef
    Convertor of DTD to X-definition.
    GenCollection
    Generates a xml document with collection of all given X-definitions.
    GenDTD
    Generation of DTD from X-definitions.
    GenDTD2XDEF
    Generation of X-definition from DTD.
    GenXDefinition
    Generate X-definition from XML.
    CheckXdef
    Check the source with the X-definition for errors.
    PrettyXdef
    Generate formated source of the X-definitions.
    XCompose
    Process the XML file with the X-definition in the construction mode.
    XdefToXsd
    Convertor of X-definition to XML Schema.
    XDChecker
    Provides checking of X-definition types and values.
    XsdToXdef
    Represents XML Schema to X-definition convertor.
    XValidate
    Validation of XML document with given X-definition.

Package cz.syntea.xdef.util Description

Tools for usage of X-definitions from command line.

CheckXDef

Checks the source X-definition or DefPool (see CheckXdef.main(String[])).

DTDToXdef

Create a X-definition from a DTD. (see DTDToXdef.main(String[])).

GenDTD

Generates DTD according to given X-definition (see GenDTD.main(String[])). Note that not all features from X-definitions are possible to express in DTD, so this tool is only to help to design the DTD.

GenCollection

Create XML document composed from set of X-definitions and/or collections. (see GenCollection.main(String[])).

GenXdef

Create X-definition from XML document. (see GenXDefinition.main(String[])).

PrettyXdef

Createtes the formatted X-definition source nice and more readable. (see PrettyXdef.main(String[])).

XCompose

Composes the new XML from given source according to given X-definition. (see XCompose.main(String[])).

XdefToXsd

Create a XML schema document created from a set of X-definitions and/or collections. (see XdefToXsd.main(String[])).

XsdToXdef

Create a X-definition from a XML schema. (see XsdToXdef.main(String[])).

XValidate

Validates and processes the XML data according to given X-definition. (see XValidate.main(String[])).

XDChecker

Enables to check a text value with a validation method. (see XDChecker).
